channel.title: Custom Armour Help
channel.description: I like to make custom items, and I've made some awesome armour and added it to my server. My question is, how do you animate armour with datmaker? Whenever I walk, the platelegs don't move :S Anybody help?

item.title: Custom Armour Help
item.dc:creator: @drunkmunky drunkmunky
item.description:
@drunkmunky wrote:

I like to make custom items, and I’ve made some awesome armour and added it to my server. My question is, how do you animate armour with datmaker? Whenever I walk, the platelegs don’t move :S Anybody help?

Read full topic
